cleaned_text: Beautiful Bali Discover the secret to a more meaningful life at our Bali Escape. Explore your spirituality and reconnect with your authentic self in luxurious, pristine surrounds. Our retreat provides an ideal environment to disconnect from the modern world. Attendees will refocus their energies and aim to achieve inner peace and wellness through a journey of self-discovery. Our Bali Escape includes a complete program of traditional Balinese healing ceremonies hand-picked by Luxury at Our Exclusive Retreat [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="3/4][vc_column_text] The retreat will be held in Seseh on the west coast of Bali. Seseh is an untouched remote village set far from the tourist crowds common to Indonesia. Your home will be Udara Bali a lavish 5-star hotel nestled between the Indian Ocean and set amongst rice fields and ancient temples. This unique location provides a peaceful base with plenty of opportunities to experience the rich cultural heritage of Bali. Our Bali Escape includes a complete range of bespoke beauty and wellness treatments including luxurious massage and facials. The resort offers yoga, meditation, a private beach, pool, spa and sauna facilities. Sumptuous chef-prepared organic meals and bottled water are also included in the package. Our retreat will include an excursion to Tanah Lot and an opportunity to watch the sun set over the sacred temple and a blessing ceremony*. Our accommodation is an easy 20-minute walk to Canguu, famous for its colourful beachfront bars, surf and cafes for those wanting to explore the area.
